UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Modification of chicken avian beta-defensin-8 at positively selected amino acid sites enhances specific antimicrobial activity.
Literature.Author: Higgs R, Lynn DJ, Cahalane S, Alaña I, Hewage CM, James T, Lloyd AT, O'Farrelly C
